FuncDef:
The car-mode enable command enables the CAR mode for a flow queue in a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode.
The undo car-mode enable command disables the CAR mode for a flow queue in a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the CAR mode for a flow queue with a specified priority, run the car-mode enable command. In CAR mode, a device does not cache user packets, reducing the delay. It is recommended that the CAR mode be enabled for flow queues that have high requirements on the delay.
Prerequisites
A flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode has been configured.
Precautions
Only LPUI-52/LPUF-53/LPUI-242/LPUF-243/LPUI-242-CM/LPUI-242-G/LPUI-402/LPUI-402-CM/LPUF-483/LPUI-2T-L/LPUI-2T-CM/LPUF-1T2 boards support a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode.
The CAR mode can be enabled only for flow queues with CoS 5, CoS 6, and CoS 7.
The CAR mode takes effect only for downstream traffic.
